lead_paragraph: AMABILE--Clare Brown, 93, of Princeton, NJ on March 18, 2016. A woman ahead of her time, she built a successful business, Clare Brown Associates, subsequently acquired by Maritz Market Research, Inc. She was a lifelong mentor and volunteer. Predeceased by her husband, Frank R. Amabile in 2004, she is survived by her children, Jean Telljohann of Manhattan and Princeton, Raymond Amabile of Wethersfield, CT, Gael Amabile of St. Paul, MN, six grandchildren, and three great-grandchildren. For complete obituary and to leave remembrances visit: thekimblefuneralhome.com 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  AMABILE, CLARE BROWN
